(CVE-2015-8835, CVE-2016-3185) It was discovered that the PHP MySQL native driver incorrectly handled TLS connections to MySQL databases. A man in the middle attacker could possibly use this issue to downgrade and snoop on TLS connections. This vulnerability is known as BACKRONYM. (CVE-2015-8838) It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled the imagerotate function. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly obtain sensitive information. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu 15.10. (CVE-2016-1903) Hans Jerry Illikainen discovered that the PHP phar extension incorrectly handled certain tar archives. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2016-2554) It was discovered that the PHP WDDX extension incorrectly handled certain malformed XML data. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2016-3141) It was discovered that the PHP phar extension incorrectly handled certain zip files. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly obtain sensitive information. (CVE-2016-3142) It was discovered that the PHP libxml_disable_entity_loader() setting was shared between threads. When running under PHP-FPM, this could result in XML external entity injection and entity expansion issues. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 12.04 LTS and Ubuntu 14.04 LTS. (No CVE number) It was discovered that the PHP openssl_random_pseudo_bytes() function did not return cryptographically strong pseudo-random bytes. (No CVE number) It was discovered that the PHP Fileinfo component incorrectly handled certain magic files. An attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE number pending) It was discovered that the PHP php_snmp_error() function incorrectly handled string formatting. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu 15.10. (CVE number pending) It was discovered that the PHP rawurlencode() function incorrectly handled large strings. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE number pending) It was discovered that the PHP phar extension incorrectly handled certain filenames in archives. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE number pending) It was discovered that the PHP mb_strcut() function incorrectly handled string formatting. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE number pending)

fbd3e909206e1a771ee90f5eb8b1941cc037d341.title: USN-2958-1: poppler vulnerabilities
fbd3e909206e1a771ee90f5eb8b1941cc037d341.body: It was discovered that poppler incorrectly parsed certain malformed PDF documents. If a user or automated system were tricked into opening a crafted PDF file, an attacker could cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code with privileges of the user invoking the program. (CVE-2015-8868)

1c128601cd08cfe02d8614ce5ab17a25d6cf30c6.title: USN-2986-1: dosfstools vulnerabilities
1c128601cd08cfe02d8614ce5ab17a25d6cf30c6.body: Hanno Böck discovered that dosfstools incorrectly handled certain malformed filesystems. A local attacker could use this issue to cause dosfstools to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.

303b7480428fa297de2201c3b24502991b70d775.title: USN-2987-1: GD library vulnerabilities
303b7480428fa297de2201c3b24502991b70d775.body: It was discovered that the GD library incorrectly handled memory when using gdImageFillToBorder(). A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2015-8874)

335e47e5b046b44860229bd90214d04cf7711958.title: USN-3085-1: GDK-PixBuf vulnerabilities
335e47e5b046b44860229bd90214d04cf7711958.body: It was discovered that the GDK-PixBuf library contained an integer overflow when handling certain images. If a user or automated system were tricked into opening a crafted image file, a remote attacker could use this flaw to cause GDK-PixBuf to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. This issue only affected Ubuntu 12.04 LTS and Ubuntu 14.04 LTS. (CVE-2015-8875)

b789a461ff65a038a61717cd541bcdd81e55e90c.title: USN-2987-1: GD library vulnerabilities
b789a461ff65a038a61717cd541bcdd81e55e90c.body: It was discovered that the GD library incorrectly handled memory when using gdImageScaleTwoPass(). A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS, Ubuntu 15.10 and Ubuntu 16.04 LTS. (CVE-2015-8877)

364d0b2ded145bff8b1d4c04d392afec1f2402df.title: USN-3009-1: Dnsmasq vulnerability
364d0b2ded145bff8b1d4c04d392afec1f2402df.body: Edwin Török discovered that Dnsmasq incorrectly handled certain CNAME responses. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause Dnsmasq to crash, resulting in a denial of service.

aaebd2d41a9e92645896a59d8461a1403ddee04e.title: USN-3033-1: libarchive vulnerabilities
aaebd2d41a9e92645896a59d8461a1403ddee04e.body: Hanno Böck discovered that libarchive contained multiple security issues when processing certain malformed archive files. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause libarchive to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2015-8916, CVE-2015-8917 CVE-2015-8919, CVE-2015-8920, CVE-2015-8921, CVE-2015-8922, CVE-2015-8923, CVE-2015-8924, CVE-2015-8925, CVE-2015-8926, CVE-2015-8928, CVE-2015-8930, CVE-2015-8931, CVE-2015-8932, CVE-2015-8933, CVE-2015-8934, CVE-2016-5844)

062cd3b07642fe1c5f18bc4aa784a2db6b9e4757.title: USN-3032-1: eCryptfs vulnerability
062cd3b07642fe1c5f18bc4aa784a2db6b9e4757.body: It was discovered that eCryptfs incorrectly configured the encrypted swap partition for certain drive types. An attacker could use this issue to discover sensitive information.

142b16bcaf9a5625fa60739702b66ca3bbd48b72.title: USN-3067-1: HarfBuzz vulnerabilities
142b16bcaf9a5625fa60739702b66ca3bbd48b72.body: Kostya Serebryany discovered that HarfBuzz incorrectly handled memory. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause HarfBuzz to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2015-8947)

387dd695739230be447640929a0b9d0a78ffc9b7.title: USN-3068-1: Libidn vulnerabilities
387dd695739230be447640929a0b9d0a78ffc9b7.body: Hanno Böck discovered that Libidn incorrectly handled certain input. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Libidn to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2015-8948, CVE-2016-6262, CVE-2016-6261, CVE-2016-6263)

49c35a81b0ea8c7c4af9015d0b28d6d8ed53e0e3.title: USN-2883-1: OpenSSL vulnerability
49c35a81b0ea8c7c4af9015d0b28d6d8ed53e0e3.body: Antonio Sanso discovered that OpenSSL reused the same private DH exponentfor the life of a server process when configured with a X9.42 styleparameter file. This could allow a remote attacker to possibly discover theserver's private DH exponent when being used with non-safe primes.

ac188be26fcffc4c7422008a56045a5c35053e1e.title: USN-2914-1: OpenSSL vulnerabilities
ac188be26fcffc4c7422008a56045a5c35053e1e.body: Yuval Yarom, Daniel Genkin, and Nadia Heninger discovered that OpenSSL wasvulnerable to a side-channel attack on modular exponentiation. On certainCPUs, a local attacker could possibly use this issue to recover RSA keys.This flaw is known as CacheBleed. (CVE-2016-0702)

b93f552e528aa25d789019ddf166dbd28900d268.title: USN-3024-1: Tomcat vulnerabilities
b93f552e528aa25d789019ddf166dbd28900d268.body: It was discovered that Tomcat did not place StatusManagerServlet on theRestrictedServlets list. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue toread arbitrary HTTP requests, including session ID values. This issue onlyaffected Ubuntu 12.04 LTS, Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu 15.10.(CVE-2016-0706)

ce3af1ab6df7a7131473e06dc883a35c5f53bdd2.title: USN-3024-1: Tomcat vulnerabilities
ce3af1ab6df7a7131473e06dc883a35c5f53bdd2.body: It was discovered that the Tomcat session-persistence implementationincorrectly handled session attributes. A remote attacker could possiblyuse this issue to execute arbitrary code in a privileged context. Thisissue only affected Ubuntu 12.04 LTS, Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu 15.10.(CVE-2016-0714)

571fc4d684508a4a244b6e7f4a1f855045b1a5c4.title: USN-2983-1: Expat vulnerability
571fc4d684508a4a244b6e7f4a1f855045b1a5c4.body: Gustavo Grieco discovered that Expat incorrectly handled malformed XMLdata. If a user or application linked against Expat were tricked intoopening a crafted XML file, an attacker could cause a denial of service, orpossibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2016-0718)

c1f54e1ed54a1b9ff86bd1e2fb489cb11c550539.title: USN-3044-1: Firefox vulnerabilities
c1f54e1ed54a1b9ff86bd1e2fb489cb11c550539.body: Gustavo Grieco discovered an out-of-bounds read during XML parsing insome circumstances. If a user were tricked in to opening a speciallycrafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit this to cause adenial of service via application crash, or obtain sensitive information.(CVE-2016-0718)

4eaeb6c1fea98e1218d654b1c58982a97df6abb1.title: USN-2967-1: Linux kernel vulnerabilities
4eaeb6c1fea98e1218d654b1c58982a97df6abb1.body: It was discovered that a race condition existed in the ioctl handler forthe TTY driver in the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this tocause a denial of service (system crash) or expose sensitive information.(CVE-2016-0723)

a87f0bad6d7477356e90648ad76ad7f6364f2dd7.title: USN-2967-2: Linux kernel (OMAP4) vulnerabilities
a87f0bad6d7477356e90648ad76ad7f6364f2dd7.body: It was discovered that a race condition existed in the ioctl handler forthe TTY driver in the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this tocause a denial of service (system crash) or expose sensitive information.(CVE-2016-0723)

fa56c5dd4c46cabbd9dba131aaa4424c64609d0c.title: USN-2930-1: Linux kernel vulnerabilities
fa56c5dd4c46cabbd9dba131aaa4424c64609d0c.body: It was discovered that a race condition existed in the ioctl handler forthe TTY driver in the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this tocause a denial of service (system crash) or expose sensitive information.(CVE-2016-0723)

6db4e27393b2843a4b1783c466f6cfe1dba21d7d.title: USN-2929-1: Linux kernel vulnerabilities
6db4e27393b2843a4b1783c466f6cfe1dba21d7d.body: It was discovered that a race condition existed in the ioctl handler forthe TTY driver in the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this tocause a denial of service (system crash) or expose sensitive information.(CVE-2016-0723)

7b63cf365e022886c9e7895b376a91c97d8d73b1.title: USN-2932-1: Linux kernel (Vivid HWE) vulnerabilities
7b63cf365e022886c9e7895b376a91c97d8d73b1.body: It was discovered that a race condition existed in the ioctl handler forthe TTY driver in the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this tocause a denial of service (system crash) or expose sensitive information.(CVE-2016-0723)

a39d2346e01efad523e84250ab31bcc49be97ab0.title: USN-2948-2: Linux kernel (Utopic HWE) regression
a39d2346e01efad523e84250ab31bcc49be97ab0.body: It was discovered that a race condition existed in the ioctl handler for the TTY driver in the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or expose sensitive information. (CVE-2016-0723)

94e375ac829f3aa239f831f9ded5a9ebe70177d9.title: USN-2930-2: Linux kernel (Wily HWE) vulnerabilities
94e375ac829f3aa239f831f9ded5a9ebe70177d9.body: It was discovered that a race condition existed in the ioctl handler forthe TTY driver in the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this tocause a denial of service (system crash) or expose sensitive information.(CVE-2016-0723)

65185862606fb2c6c5121bd1acf972de16b92e14.title: USN-2929-2: Linux kernel (Trusty HWE) vulnerabilities
65185862606fb2c6c5121bd1acf972de16b92e14.body: It was discovered that a race condition existed in the ioctl handler forthe TTY driver in the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this tocause a denial of service (system crash) or expose sensitive information.(CVE-2016-0723)

5ed292d29b777d3c163e3c898c1737dbe05a5be1.title: USN-2930-3: Linux kernel (Raspberry Pi 2) vulnerabilities
5ed292d29b777d3c163e3c898c1737dbe05a5be1.body: It was discovered that a race condition existed in the ioctl handler forthe TTY driver in the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this tocause a denial of service (system crash) or expose sensitive information.(CVE-2016-0723)

80d28eb0face23e3f32feee500f79261df6f9bc6.title: USN-2948-1: Linux kernel (Utopic HWE) vulnerabilities
80d28eb0face23e3f32feee500f79261df6f9bc6.body: It was discovered that a race condition existed in the ioctl handler forthe TTY driver in the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this tocause a denial of service (system crash) or expose sensitive information.(CVE-2016-0723)

b9a0a4d78e945a8c9b091e9f34d09229658bbe86.title: USN-3096-1: NTP vulnerabilities
b9a0a4d78e945a8c9b091e9f34d09229658bbe86.body: It was discovered that the NTP cronjob incorrectly cleaned up thestatistics directory. A local attacker could possibly use this to escalateprivileges. (CVE-2016-0727)

bb78ae4c32d033ec8387563ffdec81a0d68cecf4.title: USN-2912-1: libssh vulnerabilities
bb78ae4c32d033ec8387563ffdec81a0d68cecf4.body: Aris Adamantiadis discovered that libssh incorrectly generated ephemeralsecret keys of 128 bits instead of the recommended 1024 or 2048 bits whenusing the diffie-hellman-group1 and diffie-hellman-group14 methods. If aremote attacker were able to perform a man-in-the-middle attack, this flawcould be exploited to view sensitive information. (CVE-2016-0739)

e5234db4c08caf9e93386f19623b9444112f51c2.title: USN-2892-1: nginx vulnerabilities
e5234db4c08caf9e93386f19623b9444112f51c2.body: It was discovered that nginx incorrectly handled certain DNS serverresponses when the resolver is enabled. A remote attacker could possiblyuse this issue to cause nginx to crash, resulting in a denial of service.(CVE-2016-0742)

f4aacb811300fab3c057184e52754cbb3799d36d.title: USN-2892-1: nginx vulnerabilities
f4aacb811300fab3c057184e52754cbb3799d36d.body: It was discovered that nginx incorrectly handled CNAME response processingwhen the resolver is enabled. A remote attacker could use this issue tocause nginx to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly executearbitrary code. (CVE-2016-0746)

a89e4872a2f32933ba0344270504ef66e58f669e.title: USN-3014-1: Spice vulnerabilities
a89e4872a2f32933ba0344270504ef66e58f669e.body: Jing Zhao discovered that the Spice smartcard support incorrectly handledmemory. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause Spice to crash,resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. Thisissue only applied to Ubuntu 15.10 and Ubuntu 16.04 LTS. (CVE-2016-0749)

1734186d0a6053735d3e7906786483fc3078ab6c.title: USN-2882-1: curl vulnerability
1734186d0a6053735d3e7906786483fc3078ab6c.body: Isaac Boukris discovered that curl could incorrectly re-use NTLM proxycredentials when subsequently connecting to the same host.

0d6692848ed2a4e0c629b6584241d43ad65471a0.title: USN-3024-1: Tomcat vulnerabilities
0d6692848ed2a4e0c629b6584241d43ad65471a0.body: It was discovered that the Tomcat setGlobalContext method incorrectlychecked if callers were authorized. A remote attacker could possibly usethis issue to read or wite to arbitrary application data, or cause a denialof service. This issue only affected Ubuntu 12.04 LTS, Ubuntu 14.04 LTS andUbuntu 15.10. (CVE-2016-0763)

00dad2245118730c1f4c660bfa859a16ff54b9a4.title: USN-2894-1: PostgreSQL vulnerabilities
00dad2245118730c1f4c660bfa859a16ff54b9a4.body: It was discovered that PostgreSQL incorrectly handled certain configurationsettings (GUCS) for users of PL/Java. A remote attacker could possibly usethis issue to escalate privileges. (CVE-2016-0766)

2e5a2c660fd6d0701e79776d5c429a078b18e284.title: USN-2922-1: Samba vulnerabilities
2e5a2c660fd6d0701e79776d5c429a078b18e284.body: Garming Sam and Douglas Bagnall discovered that the Samba internal DNSserver incorrectly handled certain DNS TXT records. A remote attacker coulduse this issue to cause Samba to crash, resulting in a denial of service,or possibly obtain uninitialized memory contents. This issue only appliedto Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu 15.10. (CVE-2016-0771)

640950f747d6efe8154309a6f602c48f8cb2f9ff.title: USN-2894-1: PostgreSQL vulnerabilities
640950f747d6efe8154309a6f602c48f8cb2f9ff.body: It was discovered that PostgreSQL incorrectly handled certain regularexpressions. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to causePostgreSQL to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2016-0773)

7b1db2b266e423637867a03b73a6aca208e0fdb3.title: USN-2968-1: Linux kernel vulnerabilities
7b1db2b266e423637867a03b73a6aca208e0fdb3.body: It was discovered that the Linux kernel did not keep accurate track of pipebuffer details when error conditions occurred, due to an incomplete fix forCVE-2015-1805. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service(system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code with administrativeprivileges. (CVE-2016-0774)

bc3c1539b502152620faab0046f11dc816054aa7.title: USN-2967-1: Linux kernel vulnerabilities
bc3c1539b502152620faab0046f11dc816054aa7.body: It was discovered that the Linux kernel did not keep accurate track of pipebuffer details when error conditions occurred, due to an incomplete fix forCVE-2015-1805. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service(system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code with administrativeprivileges. (CVE-2016-0774)

f1705fcdcaddfe87c6f7372370678544bfbeff62.title: USN-2967-2: Linux kernel (OMAP4) vulnerabilities
f1705fcdcaddfe87c6f7372370678544bfbeff62.body: It was discovered that the Linux kernel did not keep accurate track of pipebuffer details when error conditions occurred, due to an incomplete fix forCVE-2015-1805. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service(system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code with administrativeprivileges. (CVE-2016-0774)

6a9f1313e1b63a89fa39ccb8898133220c23a181.title: USN-2968-2: Linux kernel (Trusty HWE) vulnerabilities
6a9f1313e1b63a89fa39ccb8898133220c23a181.body: It was discovered that the Linux kernel did not keep accurate track of pipebuffer details when error conditions occurred, due to an incomplete fix forCVE-2015-1805. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service(system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code with administrativeprivileges. (CVE-2016-0774)

79879db69c15de3c39bb959a2aee369efc5cc144.title: USN-2869-1: OpenSSH vulnerabilities
79879db69c15de3c39bb959a2aee369efc5cc144.body: It was discovered that the OpenSSH client experimental support for resumingconnections contained multiple security issues. A malicious server coulduse this issue to leak client memory to the server, including privateclient user keys.

18ff4edfa6329717aa6be289d29821e3af77d9f7.title: USN-2899-1: LibreOffice vulnerabilities
18ff4edfa6329717aa6be289d29821e3af77d9f7.body: It was discovered that LibreOffice incorrectly handled LWP document files.If a user were tricked into opening a specially crafted LWP document, aremote attacker could cause LibreOffice to crash, and possibly executearbitrary code.

6daae5b7a2dde5e40acc4508c9512655a20b5e6e.title: USN-2914-1: OpenSSL vulnerabilities
6daae5b7a2dde5e40acc4508c9512655a20b5e6e.body: Emilia Käsper discovered that OpenSSL incorrectly handled memory whenperforming SRP user database lookups. A remote attacker could possibly usethis issue to cause OpenSSL to consume memory, resulting in a denial ofservice. (CVE-2016-0798)

0e1edb95803563054c6cef70c83f21340329844c.title: USN-2914-1: OpenSSL vulnerabilities
0e1edb95803563054c6cef70c83f21340329844c.body: Guido Vranken discovered that OpenSSL incorrectly handled memory whenprinting very long strings. A remote attacker could use this issue to causeOpenSSL to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly executearbitrary code. (CVE-2016-0799)

7077b58a0876b67d273838b17b31210d8219f371.title: USN-3176-1: PCSC-Lite vulnerability
7077b58a0876b67d273838b17b31210d8219f371.body: Peter Wu discovered that the PC/SC service did not correctly handle certainresources. A local attacker could use this issue to cause PC/SC to crash,resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code withroot privileges.

79b778b054538db745017f26796e6e2546d53808.title: USN-3081-1: Tomcat vulnerability
79b778b054538db745017f26796e6e2546d53808.body: Dawid Golunski discovered that the Tomcat init script incorrectly handledcreating log files. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue toobtain root privileges. (CVE-2016-1240)

d1a9b30c329a2479c60e994a40c7f483bd287e1f.title: USN-3139-1: Vim vulnerability
d1a9b30c329a2479c60e994a40c7f483bd287e1f.body: Florian Larysch discovered that the Vim text editor did not properlyvalidate values for the 'filetype', 'syntax', and 'keymap' options. Anattacker could trick a user into opening a file with specially craftedmodelines and possibly execute arbitrary code with the user's privileges.

12e32373f385840d576561aebd0196cdb80fe7e0.title: USN-2925-1: Bind vulnerabilities
12e32373f385840d576561aebd0196cdb80fe7e0.body: It was discovered that Bind incorrectly handled input received by the rndccontrol channel. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to causeBind to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2016-1285)

eefa4e1a875395262b1cf5a1fb27b02fd103b05e.title: USN-2925-1: Bind vulnerabilities
eefa4e1a875395262b1cf5a1fb27b02fd103b05e.body: It was discovered that Bind incorrectly parsed resource record signaturesfor DNAME resource records. A remote attacker could possibly use this issueto cause Bind to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2016-1286)

b26431e77c986eefb563747e708dfd897421b956.title: USN-3093-1: ClamAV vulnerabilities
b26431e77c986eefb563747e708dfd897421b956.body: It was discovered that ClamAV incorrectly handled certain malformed files.A remote attacker could use this issue to cause ClamAV to crash, resultingin a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.In the default installation, attackers would be isolated by the ClamAVAppArmor profile.

4b350e7c0124c184b07378ac7833d8e0a815e834.title: USN-3046-1: LibreOffice vulnerability
4b350e7c0124c184b07378ac7833d8e0a815e834.body: Yves Younan and Richard Johnson discovered that LibreOffice incorrectlyhandled presentation files. If a user were tricked into opening aspecially crafted presentation file, a remote attacker could causeLibreOffice to crash, and possibly execute arbitrary code.

7404db1ea7b9b2d00940e28c8c59660463aa09ae.title: USN-2902-1: graphite2 vulnerabilities
7404db1ea7b9b2d00940e28c8c59660463aa09ae.body: Yves Younan discovered that graphite2 incorrectly handled certain malformedfonts. If a user or automated system were tricked into opening a specially-crafted font file, a remote attacker could use this issue to causegraphite2 to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly executearbitrary code.

dc19202eb43eaf790299df431f139a94b39b44fc.title: USN-2933-1: Exim vulnerabilities
dc19202eb43eaf790299df431f139a94b39b44fc.body: It was discovered that Exim incorrectly filtered environment variables whenused with the perl_startup configuration option. If the perl_startup optionwas enabled, a local attacker could use this issue to escalate theirprivileges to the root user. This issue has been fixed by having Exim cleanthe complete execution environment by default on startup, including anysubprocesses such as transports that call other programs. This change inbehaviour may break existing installations and can be adjusted by using twonew configuration options, keep_environment and add_environment.(CVE-2016-1531)

24c4f77e934775c6bb13796fe29216256042b505.title: USN-2981-1: libarchive vulnerabilities
24c4f77e934775c6bb13796fe29216256042b505.body: It was discovered that libarchive incorrectly handled certain entry-sizevalues in ZIP archives. A remote attacker could use this issue to causelibarchive to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly executearbitrary code. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS, Ubuntu 15.10and Ubuntu 16.04 LTS. (CVE-2016-1541)

a10fa6509f2cf18bf1ef2d861bc99b830dedf20f.title: USN-3096-1: NTP vulnerabilities
a10fa6509f2cf18bf1ef2d861bc99b830dedf20f.body: Matthew Van Gundy, Stephen Gray and Loganaden Velvindron discovered thatNTP incorrectly handled message authentication. A remote attacker couldpossibly use this issue to recover the message digest key. (CVE-2016-1550)

8ae820ef3e0c1a170361c41bb45fe3e3f88de11b.title: USN-2876-1: eCryptfs vulnerability
8ae820ef3e0c1a170361c41bb45fe3e3f88de11b.body: Jann Horn discovered that mount.ecryptfs_private would mount over certaindirectories in the proc filesystem. A local attacker could use this to escalatetheir privileges. (CVE-2016-1572)

7ba836e46dfb565a575feb797a01a18b6a245ff9.title: USN-2956-1: ubuntu-core-launcher vulnerability
7ba836e46dfb565a575feb797a01a18b6a245ff9.body: Zygmunt Krynicki discovered that ubuntu-core-launcher did not properlysanitize its input and contained a logic error when determining themountpoint of bind mounts when using snaps on Ubuntu classic systems (eg,traditional desktop and server). If a user were tricked into installing amalicious snap with a crafted snap name, an attacker could perform adelayed attack to steal data or execute code within the security context ofanother snap. This issue did not affect Ubuntu Core systems.

ad336d56bc07e7eb197b5ef67fa9add99982e0ea.title: USN-2988-1: LXD vulnerabilities
ad336d56bc07e7eb197b5ef67fa9add99982e0ea.body: Robie Basak discovered that LXD incorrectly set permissions when switchingan unprivileged container into privileged mode. A local attacker could usethis issue to access any world readable path in the container directory,including setuid binaries. (CVE-2016-1582)

487f2a7e1b5de44d1ba58b17e2a77ab6d7c48e16.title: USN-2997-1: Linux kernel (OMAP4) vulnerabilities
487f2a7e1b5de44d1ba58b17e2a77ab6d7c48e16.body: Jann Horn discovered that eCryptfs improperly attempted to use the mmap()handler of a lower filesystem that did not implement one, causing arecursive page fault to occur. A local unprivileged attacker could use tocause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary codewith administrative privileges. (CVE-2016-1583)

f4099c10d37ed9423e72eaec01fa64b5ebaa64ca.title: USN-2877-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
f4099c10d37ed9423e72eaec01fa64b5ebaa64ca.body: A bad cast was discovered in V8. If a user were tricked in to opening aspecially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit this tocause a denial of service via renderer crash or execute arbitrary codewith the privileges of the sandboxed render process. (CVE-2016-1612)

d94924049bd497028174f6c9f1eb95429f925d3d.title: USN-2877-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
d94924049bd497028174f6c9f1eb95429f925d3d.body: An issue was discovered when initializing the UnacceleratedImageBufferSurfaceclass in Blink. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially craftedwebsite, an attacker could potentially exploit this to obtain sensitiveinformation. (CVE-2016-1614)

6c1d4907c6b8119a8ec7a6ddf1256d5a22bd46c6.title: USN-2877-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
6c1d4907c6b8119a8ec7a6ddf1256d5a22bd46c6.body: An issue was discovered with the CSP implementation in Blink. If a userwere tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker couldpotentially exploit this to determine whether specific HSTS sites had beenvisited by reading a CSP report. (CVE-2016-1617)

c70de50e3eaad6a02bd1a526bbb357e09f9f8455.title: USN-2877-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
c70de50e3eaad6a02bd1a526bbb357e09f9f8455.body: An issue was discovered with random number generator in Blink. An attackercould potentially exploit this to defeat cryptographic protectionmechanisms. (CVE-2016-1618)

81058014d13e679cf477ee3790986cd217bdc24a.title: USN-2895-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
81058014d13e679cf477ee3790986cd217bdc24a.body: The DOM implementation in Chromium did not properly restrict frame-attachoperations from occurring during or after frame-detach operations. If auser were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attackercould potentially exploit this to bypass same-origin restrictions.(CVE-2016-1623)

d04c01b795f46fc8704290ec167f85015f9c4645.title: USN-2895-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
d04c01b795f46fc8704290ec167f85015f9c4645.body: An integer underflow was discovered in Brotli. If a user were tricked into opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentiallyexploit this to cause a denial of service via application crash, orexecute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user invoking theprogram. (CVE-2016-1624)

34cb0a6d6891bcab745902feaca1c3395397d3c4.title: USN-2905-1: Oxide vulnerability
34cb0a6d6891bcab745902feaca1c3395397d3c4.body: A security issue was discovered in Chromium. If a user were tricked in toopening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploitthis to bypass same-origin restrictions or a sandbox protection mechanism.(CVE-2016-1629)

13aa9a3df64bb54f68424bebd07b6c89ccc39500.title: USN-2920-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
13aa9a3df64bb54f68424bebd07b6c89ccc39500.body: It was discovered that the ContainerNode::parserRemoveChild function inBlink mishandled widget updates in some circumstances. If a user weretricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker couldpotentially exploit this to bypass same-origin restrictions.(CVE-2016-1630)

c0316d28b16a65eac40a4c59722254c8b5849c4b.title: USN-2920-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
c0316d28b16a65eac40a4c59722254c8b5849c4b.body: It was discovered that the PPB_Flash_MessageLoop_Impl::InternalRunfunction in Chromium mishandled nested message loops. If a user weretricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker couldpotentially exploit this to bypass same-origin restrictions.(CVE-2016-1631)

6c8adee9d63aaec23c02230e173cb721de0e5f1e.title: USN-2920-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
6c8adee9d63aaec23c02230e173cb721de0e5f1e.body: It was discovered that the PendingScript::notifyFinished function inBlink relied on memory-cache information about integrity-check occurrencesinstead of integrity-check successes. If a user were tricked in to openinga specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit this tobypass Subresource Integrity (SRI) protections. (CVE-2016-1636)

53908bd5a1cc79c9ba50f7f84de7af9cdf9e9077.title: USN-2920-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
53908bd5a1cc79c9ba50f7f84de7af9cdf9e9077.body: It was discovered that the SkATan2_255 function in Skia mishandledarctangent calculations. If a user were tricked in to opening a speciallycrafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit this to obtainsensitive information. (CVE-2016-1637)

edad15e07e8a011b57478f5eca25705f4d3776c0.body: An out-of-bounds read was discovered in V8. If a user were tricked in toopening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploitthis to cause a denial of service via renderer crash. (CVE-2016-1646)

495eef1a1d029ce3572c9132656f25058e2c5ab2.body: A buffer overflow was discovered in ANGLE. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit this to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user invoking Firefox. (CVE-2016-1963)

23a9bb6f852685b0880030d0be19b34adaf983ad.body: Gustavo Grieco discovered that GNU cpio incorrectly handled memory whenextracting archive files. If a user or automated system were tricked intoextracting a specially-crafted cpio archive, a remote attacker could usethis issue to cause GNU cpio to crash, resulting in a denial of service, orpossibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2016-2037)

(CVE-2015-8806, CVE-2016-2073,CVE-2016-3627, CVE-2016-3705, CVE-2016-4447)

8089248787658b2c8e66fb6fca6e1ad2d4f71994.body: Guido Vranken discovered that OpenSSL incorrectly handled large amounts ofinput data to the EVP_EncodeUpdate() function. A remote attacker could usethis issue to cause OpenSSL to crash, resulting in a denial of service, orpossibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2016-2105)

c5e8713908593ff8fff96a9e1b093a8d7697d737.title: USN-2959-1: OpenSSL vulnerabilities
c5e8713908593ff8fff96a9e1b093a8d7697d737.body: Guido Vranken discovered that OpenSSL incorrectly handled large amounts ofinput data to the EVP_EncryptUpdate() function. 89ee59c9ae523e472088575e0ff44187e74cb94b.title: USN-2959-1: OpenSSL vulnerabilities
89ee59c9ae523e472088575e0ff44187e74cb94b.body: Juraj Somorovsky discovered that OpenSSL incorrectly performed padding whenthe connection uses the AES CBC cipher and the server supports AES-NI. Aremote attacker could possibly use this issue to perform a padding oracleattack and decrypt traffic. (CVE-2016-2107)

a8054fce99e4499f8f2940234571a2c713dc3aee.title: USN-2959-1: OpenSSL vulnerabilities

b2386b04605421ec00411e997e18e5929e587db1.body: Brian Carpenter discovered that OpenSSL incorrectly handled memory whenASN.1 data is read from a BIO. A remote attacker could possibly use thisissue to cause memory consumption, resulting in a denial of service.(CVE-2016-2109)

e722bff0fddbd065e06f4bb109ba1f9d008cc38a.body: Stefan Metzmacher discovered that Samba did not validate TLS certificates. A remote attacker could use this issue to spoof a Samba server. (CVE-2016-2113)

382bef1a76a682d4c9919c1a61693fafd136ef7d.body: Hans Jerry Illikainen discovered that OptiPNG incorrectly handled memory. Aremote attacker could use this issue with a specially crafted image file tocause OptiPNG to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possiblyexecute arbitrary code. (CVE-2016-2191)

c00e2e8d8a2003308f1bfe1fbf4a94c3ba1a8747.title: USN-2938-1: Git vulnerabilities
c00e2e8d8a2003308f1bfe1fbf4a94c3ba1a8747.body: Laël Cellier discovered that Git incorrectly handled path strings incrafted Git repositories. A remote attacker could use this issue to causea denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code with theprivileges of the user invoking Git. (CVE-2016-2315, CVE-2016-2324)

9a433f24fa4e3dd9ac28598f26ef8444d41cbece.title: USN-2941-1: Quagga vulnerabilities
9a433f24fa4e3dd9ac28598f26ef8444d41cbece.body: Kostya Kortchinsky discovered that Quagga incorrectly handled certain routedata when configured with BGP peers enabled for VPNv4. A remote attackercould use this issue to cause Quagga to crash, resulting in a denial ofservice, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2016-2342)

290f366219fa83d91f0b32e6345e76a80fb15229.title: USN-3031-1: Pidgin vulnerabilities
290f366219fa83d91f0b32e6345e76a80fb15229.body: Yves Younan discovered that Pidgin contained multiple issues in the MXitprotocol support. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause Pidgin tocrash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrarycode.

6901ad2e29ef43f08bf63542da9b2ec7e22ad01f.title: USN-2916-1: Perl vulnerabilities
6901ad2e29ef43f08bf63542da9b2ec7e22ad01f.body: Stephane Chazelas discovered that Perl incorrectly handled duplicateenvironment variables. An attacker could possibly use this issue to bypassthe taint protection mechanism. (CVE-2016-2381)

a87439ff8169fa1c8d34bb3c47389affab939dda.title: USN-2947-1: Linux kernel vulnerabilities
a87439ff8169fa1c8d34bb3c47389affab939dda.body: It was discovered that the extended Berkeley Packet Filter (eBPF)implementation in the Linux kernel did not correctly compute branch offsetsfor backward jumps after ctx expansion. A local attacker could use this tocause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrarycode. (CVE-2016-2383)

477b2ece39c293bd5da3e8336eae7af2533af796.title: USN-2947-2: Linux kernel (Wily HWE) vulnerabilities
477b2ece39c293bd5da3e8336eae7af2533af796.body: It was discovered that the extended Berkeley Packet Filter (eBPF)implementation in the Linux kernel did not correctly compute branch offsetsfor backward jumps after ctx expansion. A local attacker could use this tocause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrarycode. (CVE-2016-2383)

6d6787cfad0b1ef347b03e1e46f986a81849f262.title: USN-2974-1: QEMU vulnerabilities
6d6787cfad0b1ef347b03e1e46f986a81849f262.body: Zuozhi Fzz discovered that QEMU incorrectly handled USB OHCI emulationsupport. A privileged attacker inside the guest could use this issue tocause QEMU to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2016-2391)

dfc5fd84bd319dcfc49c9cc9e24de2665b2ee48f.title: USN-2915-2: Django regression
dfc5fd84bd319dcfc49c9cc9e24de2665b2ee48f.body: USN-2915-1 fixed vulnerabilities in Django. The upstream fix forCVE-2016-2512 introduced a regression for certain applications. This updatefixes the problem by applying the complete upstream regression fix.

5ff3c086b6f25090b71bb6242b892365870c795e.title: USN-2915-3: Django regression
5ff3c086b6f25090b71bb6242b892365870c795e.body: USN-2915-1 fixed vulnerabilities in Django. The upstream fix forCVE-2016-2512 introduced a regression for certain applications. This updatefixes the problem by applying the complete upstream regression fix.

da621e00de8c4abfabb9427047fdd7f5c446b3c6.title: USN-2915-1: Django vulnerabilities
da621e00de8c4abfabb9427047fdd7f5c446b3c6.body: Mark Striemer discovered that Django incorrectly handled user-suppliedredirect URLs containing basic authentication credentials. A remoteattacker could possibly use this issue to perform a cross-site scriptingattack or a malicious redirect. (CVE-2016-2512)

0a40ca2d345a729c69d3319a1633a9d11a242646.title: USN-2915-2: Django regression
0a40ca2d345a729c69d3319a1633a9d11a242646.body: Sjoerd Job Postmus discovered that Django incorrectly handled timing when doing password hashing operations. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to perform user enumeration. (CVE-2016-2513)

9cc2432c503c77e34a43229f08b783e7220db683.title: USN-2915-3: Django regression
9cc2432c503c77e34a43229f08b783e7220db683.body: Sjoerd Job Postmus discovered that Django incorrectly handled timing when doing password hashing operations. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to perform user enumeration. (CVE-2016-2513)

5ca7cb80e9e55f5d247cd814451e8b36741c4dda.title: USN-2915-1: Django vulnerabilities
5ca7cb80e9e55f5d247cd814451e8b36741c4dda.body: Sjoerd Job Postmus discovered that Django incorrectly handled timing whendoing password hashing operations. A remote attacker could possibly usethis issue to perform user enumeration. (CVE-2016-2513)

23697cb37cc37187c31f939190907ae0cf636957.title: USN-3096-1: NTP vulnerabilities
23697cb37cc37187c31f939190907ae0cf636957.body: Yihan Lian discovered that NTP incorrectly handled certail peerassociations. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause NTPto crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2016-2518)

f11cd43e06eccba1c459b12eacd1158f6ea101c7.title: USN-2974-1: QEMU vulnerabilities
f11cd43e06eccba1c459b12eacd1158f6ea101c7.body: Qinghao Tang discovered that QEMU incorrectly handled USB Net emulationsupport. A privileged attacker inside the guest could use this issue tocause QEMU to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly leakhost memory bytes. (CVE-2016-2538)

98140a52d7e1bf9ac948403464be3acd6bb7d84b.title: USN-2967-1: Linux kernel vulnerabilities

8d505b75e453a8d6a4ce3a2c64eccf627e2a7de0.title: USN-2936-3: Firefox regression
8d505b75e453a8d6a4ce3a2c64eccf627e2a7de0.body: Christian Holler, Tyson Smith, Phil Ringalda, Gary Kwong, Jesse Ruderman, Mats Palmgren, Carsten Book, Boris Zbarsky, David Bolter, Randell Jesup, Andrew McCreight, and Steve Fink discovered multiple memory safety issues in Firefox. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit these to cause a denial of service via application crash, or execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user invoking Firefox. (CVE-2016-2804, CVE-2016-2806, CVE-2016-2807)

6f2b5f42151f122dd68a92094c3a59702b3fa9e8.body: Christian Holler, Gary Kwong, Jesse Ruderman, Tyson Smith, Timothy Nikkel,Sylvestre Ledru, Julian Seward, Olli Pettay, and Karl Tomlinson,discovered multiple memory safety issues in Thunderbird. (CVE-2016-2818)

0604b1c6b15c6850c92ed479c714ee4a06d2c269.title: USN-2993-1: Firefox vulnerabilities
0604b1c6b15c6850c92ed479c714ee4a06d2c269.body: A buffer overflow was discovered when parsing HTML5 fragments in somecircumstances. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially craftedwebsite, an attacker could potentially exploit this to cause a denial ofservice via application crash, or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2016-2819)

a4ea6fd8d32c0aa9706cf2ac91d7cf560c14849f.title: USN-3044-1: Firefox vulnerabilities
a4ea6fd8d32c0aa9706cf2ac91d7cf560c14849f.body: Toni Huttunen discovered that once a favicon is requested from a site,the remote server can keep the network connection open even after the pageis closed. A remote attacked could potentially exploit this to trackusers, resulting in information disclosure. (CVE-2016-2830)

5a8f1a148a432968ab65e509de65d71a4b23c985.title: USN-2993-1: Firefox vulnerabilities
5a8f1a148a432968ab65e509de65d71a4b23c985.body: Jordi Chancel discovered a way to use a persistent menu within a element and place this in an arbitrary location. If a user were tricked into opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentiallyexploit this to spoof the addressbar contents. (CVE-2016-2822)Armin Razmdjou that the location.host property can be set to an arbitrarystring after creating an invalid data: URI. If a user were tricked in toopening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploitthis to bypass some same-origin protections. (CVE-2016-2825)A use-after-free was discovered when processing WebGL content in somecircumstances. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially craftedwebsite, an attacker could potentially exploit this to cause a denial ofservice via application crash, or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2016-2828)Tim McCormack discovered that the permissions notification can show thewrong icon when a page requests several permissions in quick succession.An attacker could potentially exploit this by tricking the user in togiving consent for access to the wrong resource. (CVE-2016-2829)It was discovered that a pointerlock can be created in a fullscreenwindow without user consent in some circumstances, and this pointerlockcannot be cancelled without quitting Firefox. If a user were tricked into opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentiallyexploit this to cause a denial of service or conduct clickjacking attacks.(CVE-2016-2831)John Schoenick discovered that CSS pseudo-classes can leak informationabout plugins that are installed but disabled. An attacker couldpotentially exploit this to fingerprint users. (CVE-2016-2832)Matt Wobensmith discovered that Content Security Policy (CSP) does notblock the loading of cross-domain Java applets when specified by policy.An attacker could potentially exploit this to bypass CSP protections andconduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks. (CVE-2016-2833)In addition, multiple unspecified security issues were discovered in NSS.(CVE-2016-2834) Update instructions The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions: Ubuntu 16.04 firefox - 47.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1 Ubuntu 15.10 firefox - 47.0+build3-0ubuntu0.15.10.1 Ubuntu 14.04 firefox - 47.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1 Ubuntu 12.04 firefox - 47.0+build3-0ubuntu0.12.04.1 After a standard system update you need to restart Firefox to makeall the necessary changes. If a user were tricked in to openinga specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit this tocause a denial of service via plugin process crash, or, in combinationwith another vulnerability to escape the GMP sandbox, execute arbitrarycode. eab118e3885ecb42e95efb766b3b62ed5b894fbf.title: USN-3044-1: Firefox vulnerabilities
eab118e3885ecb42e95efb766b3b62ed5b894fbf.body: Atte Kettunen discovered a buffer overflow when rendering SVG content insome circumstances. If a user were tricked in to opening a speciallycrafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit this to cause adenial of service via application crash, or execute arbitrary code.(CVE-2016-2838)

7343b9f045d05c54ede372d70251d68e4f0e77eb.title: USN-3044-1: Firefox vulnerabilities
7343b9f045d05c54ede372d70251d68e4f0e77eb.body: Bert Massop discovered a crash in Cairo with version 0.10 of FFmpeg. If auser were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attackercould potentially exploit this to execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2016-2839)

7ba59bc4401eec0d308edc1d801ce97fb14dc49a.title: USN-2974-1: QEMU vulnerabilities
7ba59bc4401eec0d308edc1d801ce97fb14dc49a.body: Hongke Yang discovered that QEMU incorrectly handled NE2000 emulationsupport. A privileged attacker inside the guest could use this issue tocause QEMU to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2016-2841)

2692d1506a2e450328a985dc96cbe239e24e318b.body: An invalid cast was discovered in Blink. If a user were tricked in toopening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploitthis to cause a denial of service via renderer crash or execute arbitrarycode with the privileges of the sandboxed render process. (CVE-2016-2844)

6a1f117ce9e915d7baf55dd08feeeee06ef6aaa7.title: USN-2920-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
6a1f117ce9e915d7baf55dd08feeeee06ef6aaa7.body: It was discovered that the Content Security Policy (CSP) implementation inBlink did not ignore a URL's path component in the case of a ServiceWorkerfetch. b83279e1e1ddc0940c1f7ea2ec650b9a6716bbd0.body: Jan Stancek discovered that the Linux kernel's memory manager did notproperly handle moving pages mapped by the asynchronous I/O (AIO) ringbuffer to the other nodes. A local attacker could use this to cause adenial of service (system crash).

An attacker in a guest OS could usethis to cause a denial of service (guest OS crash), gain privileges, orobtain sensitive information. (CVE-2016-3157)

cb0642dafb03d6b42f0de25fb327cedd575fe50a.title: USN-2952-1: PHP vulnerabilities
cb0642dafb03d6b42f0de25fb327cedd575fe50a.body: It was discovered that the PHP Soap client incorrectly validated datatypes. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash,resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.(CVE-2015-8835, CVE-2016-3185)

ac784c879e46080614b2e1bd9d7f6eea0ff26c6d.title: USN-2952-2: PHP regression
ac784c879e46080614b2e1bd9d7f6eea0ff26c6d.body: It was discovered that the PHP Soap client incorrectly validated data types. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2015-8835, CVE-2016-3185)

15dbc1bf40740c33ad14c405239499aac56f8091.title: USN-2974-1: QEMU vulnerabilities
15dbc1bf40740c33ad14c405239499aac56f8091.body: Wei Xiao and Qinghao Tang discovered that QEMU incorrectly handled accessin the VGA module. A privileged attacker inside the guest could use thisissue to cause QEMU to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possiblyexecute arbitrary code on the host. In the default installation, when QEMUis used with libvirt, attackers would be isolated by the libvirt AppArmorprofile. (CVE-2016-3710)

c0f5c5f50c2757e3f499898e9eded7bf7e4f3fe0.title: USN-2974-1: QEMU vulnerabilities
c0f5c5f50c2757e3f499898e9eded7bf7e4f3fe0.body: Zuozhi Fzz discovered that QEMU incorrectly handled access in the VGAmodule. A privileged attacker inside the guest could use this issue tocause QEMU to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possiblyexecute arbitrary code on the host. In the default installation, when QEMUis used with libvirt, attackers would be isolated by the libvirt AppArmorprofile. (CVE-2016-3712)

d59fed28385bc72cb06903412fa9f039d6f26ffb.title: USN-2990-1: ImageMagick vulnerabilities
d59fed28385bc72cb06903412fa9f039d6f26ffb.body: Nikolay Ermishkin and Stewie discovered that ImageMagick incorrectlysanitized untrusted input. A remote attacker could use these issues toexecute arbitrary code. These issues are known as "ImageTragick". Thisupdate disables problematic coders via the /etc/ImageMagick-6/policy.xmlconfiguration file. In certain environments the coders may need to bemanually re-enabled after making sure that ImageMagick does not processuntrusted input. (CVE-2016-3714, CVE-2016-3715, CVE-2016-3716,CVE-2016-3717, CVE-2016-3718)

5d2ee4389cee9ac45de697052c62a1af88741859.title: USN-2995-1: Squid vulnerabilities
5d2ee4389cee9ac45de697052c62a1af88741859.body: Yuriy M. Kaminskiy discovered that the Squid pinger utility incorrectlyhandled certain ICMPv6 packets. A remote attacker could use this issue tocause Squid to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly causeSquid to leak information into log files. (CVE-2016-3947)

6e4ac02acaf71e106940e68f108122e8a93a4a41.title: USN-2997-1: Linux kernel (OMAP4) vulnerabilities
6e4ac02acaf71e106940e68f108122e8a93a4a41.body: It was discovered that an out-of-bounds write could occur when handlingincoming packets in the USB/IP implementation in the Linux kernel. A remoteattacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) orpossibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2016-3955)

ec0da6caaab9b71e2f349cd68d66a76dfa949341.title: USN-2951-1: OptiPNG vulnerabilities
ec0da6caaab9b71e2f349cd68d66a76dfa949341.body: Henri Salo discovered that OptiPNG incorrectly handled memory. A remoteattacker could use this issue with a specially crafted image file to causeOptiPNG to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly executearbitrary code. (CVE-2016-3981)

2d2a32df8e35381ec0173dd0e24ca60dfd7077ba.title: USN-2951-1: OptiPNG vulnerabilities
2d2a32df8e35381ec0173dd0e24ca60dfd7077ba.body: Henri Salo discovered that OptiPNG incorrectly handled memory. A remoteattacker could use this issue with a specially crafted image file to causeOptiPNG to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly executearbitrary code. (CVE-2016-3982)

d500994be0f53759d4741a0939921274cb0153f8.title: USN-2957-1: Libtasn1 vulnerability
d500994be0f53759d4741a0939921274cb0153f8.body: Pascal Cuoq and Miod Vallat discovered that Libtasn1 incorrectly handledcertain malformed DER certificates. A remote attacker could possibly usethis issue to cause applications using Libtasn1 to hang, resulting in adenial of service.

9940846a68c5c688247b6b72d694077d858187e2.title: USN-2957-2: Libtasn1 vulnerability
9940846a68c5c688247b6b72d694077d858187e2.body: USN-2957-1 fixed a vulnerability in Libtasn1. This update provides thecorresponding update for Ubuntu 16.04 LTS. Original advisory details: Pascal Cuoq and Miod Vallat discovered that Libtasn1 incorrectly handled certain malformed DER certificates. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause applications using Libtasn1 to hang, resulting in a denial of service.

9066a0f62caeeee719041c250390ca4370cadd0d.title: USN-2995-1: Squid vulnerabilities
9066a0f62caeeee719041c250390ca4370cadd0d.body: Yuriy M. Kaminskiy discovered that the Squid cachemgr.cgi tool incorrectlyhandled certain crafted data. A remote attacker could use this issue tocause Squid to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly executearbitrary code. (CVE-2016-4051)

d903c955f593393f7125058171678ec495aa2ab0.title: USN-2995-1: Squid vulnerabilities
d903c955f593393f7125058171678ec495aa2ab0.body: It was discovered that Squid incorrectly handled certain Edge Side Includes(ESI) responses. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to causeSquid to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly executearbitrary code. (CVE-2016-4052, CVE-2016-4053, CVE-2016-4054)

41bd0e2c8b7686528b532b888630d39127686ade.title: USN-2952-1: PHP vulnerabilities
41bd0e2c8b7686528b532b888630d39127686ade.body: It was discovered that the PHP Zip extension incorrectly handleddirectories when processing certain zip files. A remote attacker couldpossibly use this issue to create arbitrary directories. (CVE-2014-9767) It was discovered that the PHP Soap client incorrectly validated datatypes. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash,resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.(CVE-2015-8835, CVE-2016-3185) It was discovered that the PHP MySQL native driver incorrectly handled TLSconnections to MySQL databases. A man in the middle attacker could possiblyuse this issue to downgrade and snoop on TLS connections. Thisvulnerability is known as BACKRONYM. (CVE-2015-8838) It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled the imagerotate function. Aremote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in adenial of service, or possibly obtain sensitive information. This issueonly applied to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu 15.10. (CVE-2016-1903) Hans Jerry Illikainen discovered that the PHP phar extension incorrectlyhandled certain tar archives. A remote attacker could use this issue tocause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly executearbitrary code. (CVE-2016-2554) It was discovered that the PHP WDDX extension incorrectly handled certainmalformed XML data. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue tocause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly executearbitrary code. (CVE-2016-3141) It was discovered that the PHP phar extension incorrectly handled certainzip files. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash,resulting in a denial of service, or possibly obtain sensitive information.(CVE-2016-3142) It was discovered that the PHP libxml_disable_entity_loader() setting wasshared between threads. When running under PHP-FPM, this could result inXML external entity injection and entity expansion issues. This issue onlyapplied to Ubuntu 12.04 LTS and Ubuntu 14.04 LTS. (No CVE number) It was discovered that the PHP openssl_random_pseudo_bytes() function didnot return cryptographically strong pseudo-random bytes. (No CVE number) It was discovered that the PHP Fileinfo component incorrectly handledcertain magic files. An attacker could use this issue to cause PHP tocrash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrarycode. (CVE number pending) It was discovered that the PHP php_snmp_error() function incorrectlyhandled string formatting. A remote attacker could use this issue to causePHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly executearbitrary code. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu15.10. (CVE number pending) It was discovered that the PHP rawurlencode() function incorrectly handledlarge strings. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP tocrash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE number pending) It was discovered that the PHP phar extension incorrectly handled certainfilenames in archives. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHPto crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrarycode. (CVE number pending) It was discovered that the PHP mb_strcut() function incorrectly handledstring formatting. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP tocrash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrarycode. (CVE number pending)

7d475dd880d751df6c7ef7ac88c45d6f087b44cb.title: USN-2952-2: PHP regression
7d475dd880d751df6c7ef7ac88c45d6f087b44cb.body: USN-2952-1 fixed vulnerabilities in PHP. One of the backported patchescaused a regression in the PHP Soap client. This update fixes the problem. We apologize for the inconvenience. Original advisory details: It was discovered that the PHP Zip extension incorrectly handled directories when processing certain zip files. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to create arbitrary directories. (CVE-2014-9767) It was discovered that the PHP Soap client incorrectly validated data types. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2015-8835, CVE-2016-3185) It was discovered that the PHP MySQL native driver incorrectly handled TLS connections to MySQL databases. A man in the middle attacker could possibly use this issue to downgrade and snoop on TLS connections. This vulnerability is known as BACKRONYM. (CVE-2015-8838) It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled the imagerotate function. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly obtain sensitive information. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu 15.10. (CVE-2016-1903) Hans Jerry Illikainen discovered that the PHP phar extension incorrectly handled certain tar archives. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2016-2554) It was discovered that the PHP WDDX extension incorrectly handled certain malformed XML data. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2016-3141) It was discovered that the PHP phar extension incorrectly handled certain zip files. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly obtain sensitive information. (CVE-2016-3142) It was discovered that the PHP libxml_disable_entity_loader() setting was shared between threads. When running under PHP-FPM, this could result in XML external entity injection and entity expansion issues. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 12.04 LTS and Ubuntu 14.04 LTS. (No CVE number) It was discovered that the PHP openssl_random_pseudo_bytes() function did not return cryptographically strong pseudo-random bytes. (No CVE number) It was discovered that the PHP Fileinfo component incorrectly handled certain magic files. An attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE number pending) It was discovered that the PHP php_snmp_error() function incorrectly handled string formatting. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu 15.10. (CVE number pending) It was discovered that the PHP rawurlencode() function incorrectly handled large strings. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE number pending) It was discovered that the PHP phar extension incorrectly handled certain filenames in archives. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE number pending) It was discovered that the PHP mb_strcut() function incorrectly handled string formatting. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE number pending)

c489d66c85d691f4e5c2e284e22410378c0e0188.title: USN-3022-1: LibreOffice vulnerability
c489d66c85d691f4e5c2e284e22410378c0e0188.body: It was discovered that LibreOffice incorrectly handled RTF document files.If a user were tricked into opening a specially crafted RTF document, aremote attacker could cause LibreOffice to crash, and possibly executearbitrary code.

2c465db12f535ed99167a4f37cfaaabe4ca0fa93.title: USN-2982-1: Libksba vulnerabilities
2c465db12f535ed99167a4f37cfaaabe4ca0fa93.body: Hanno Böck discovered that Libksba incorrectly handled decoding certain BERdata. An attacker could use this issue to cause Libksba to crash, resultingin a denial of service. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 12.04 LTS andUbuntu 14.04 LTS. (CVE-2016-4353)

a89e4c3d1dba4450ddcbc9a95b4e76006c482746.title: USN-2982-1: Libksba vulnerabilities
a89e4c3d1dba4450ddcbc9a95b4e76006c482746.body: Hanno Böck discovered that Libksba incorrectly handled decoding certain BERdata. An attacker could use this issue to cause Libksba to crash, resultingin a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. This issue onlyapplied to Ubuntu 12.04 LTS and Ubuntu 14.04 LTS. (CVE-2016-4354,CVE-2016-4355)

45141292f9bf6b3ca887b4c4ae3e3e83161b7b25.title: USN-2982-1: Libksba vulnerabilities
45141292f9bf6b3ca887b4c4ae3e3e83161b7b25.body: Hanno Böck discovered that Libksba incorrectly handled incorrect utf-8strings when decoding certain DN data. An attacker could use this issue tocause Libksba to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possiblyexecute arbitrary code. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 12.04 LTS andUbuntu 14.04 LTS. (CVE-2016-4356)

320f96b0aeca1856a1c55b212a5fb382b17aaeac.title: USN-3047-1: QEMU vulnerabilities
320f96b0aeca1856a1c55b212a5fb382b17aaeac.body: Li Qiang discovered that QEMU incorrectly handled 53C9X Fast SCSIcontroller emulation. A privileged attacker inside the guest could use thisissue to cause QEMU to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possiblyexecute arbitrary code on the host. In the default installation, when QEMUis used with libvirt, attackers would be isolated by the libvirt AppArmorprofile. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu 16.04 LTS.(CVE-2016-4439, CVE-2016-4441, CVE-2016-5238, CVE-2016-5338, CVE-2016-6351)

ac910b323cb323d3edb0693a667aed968bd63bd8.title: USN-3047-2: QEMU regression
ac910b323cb323d3edb0693a667aed968bd63bd8.body: Li Qiang discovered that QEMU incorrectly handled 53C9X Fast SCSI controller emulation. A privileged attacker inside the guest could use this issue to cause QEMU to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code on the host. In the default installation, when QEMU is used with libvirt, attackers would be isolated by the libvirt AppArmor profile. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu 16.04 LTS. (CVE-2016-4439, CVE-2016-4441, CVE-2016-5238, CVE-2016-5338, CVE-2016-6351)

2e3821ed2f6c57a2be574340d34c8fea4219cf0b.title: USN-2994-1: libxml2 vulnerabilities
2e3821ed2f6c57a2be574340d34c8fea4219cf0b.body: It was discovered that libxml2 would load certain XML external entities. Ifa user or automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafteddocument, an attacker could possibly obtain access to arbitrary files orcause resource consumption. (CVE-2016-4449)

7702b8e34ffa07b47adba2b0185eb71332f3fee3.title: USN-2991-1: nginx vulnerability
7702b8e34ffa07b47adba2b0185eb71332f3fee3.body: It was discovered that nginx incorrectly handled saving client requestbodies to temporary files. A remote attacker could possibly use this issueto cause nginx to crash, resulting in a denial of service.

4822bf12bbeda6be6b6fb4c0b8e73cdded29a16a.title: USN-3047-1: QEMU vulnerabilities
4822bf12bbeda6be6b6fb4c0b8e73cdded29a16a.body: Li Qiang and Qinghao Tang discovered that QEMU incorrectly handled theVMWare VGA module. A privileged attacker inside the guest could use thisissue to cause QEMU to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possiblyto obtain sensitive host memory. (CVE-2016-4453, CVE-2016-4454)

042205686ddc7e6d3a82752db86b9c573e13dac8.title: USN-3047-2: QEMU regression
042205686ddc7e6d3a82752db86b9c573e13dac8.body: Li Qiang and Qinghao Tang discovered that QEMU incorrectly handled the VMWare VGA module. A privileged attacker inside the guest could use this issue to cause QEMU to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly to obtain sensitive host memory. (CVE-2016-4453, CVE-2016-4454)

c37c10e61319ce6cb0e162b40f5ba2a20307882e.title: USN-3013-1: XML-RPC for C and C++ vulnerabilities
c37c10e61319ce6cb0e162b40f5ba2a20307882e.body: It was discovered that the Expat code in XML-RPC for C and C++ incorrectlyhandled malformed XML data. If a user or application linked against XML-RPCfor C and C++ were tricked into opening a crafted XML file, an attackercould cause a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.(CVE-2015-1283, CVE-2016-4472)

803380a5263936bc18c24e29e7631877b22371ac.body: Imre Rad discovered that wpa_supplicant and hostapd incorrectly handledinvalid characters in passphrase parameters. A remote attacker could usethis issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2016-4476)

0f365c2290f73a1da2e68d8ea4dbc302163578b2.title: USN-3166-1: WebKitGTK+ vulnerabilities
0f365c2290f73a1da2e68d8ea4dbc302163578b2.body: A large number of security issues were discovered in the WebKitGTK+ Web andJavaScript engines. If a user were tricked into viewing a maliciouswebsite, a remote attacker could exploit a variety of issues related to webbrowser security, including cross-site scripting attacks, denial of serviceattacks, and arbitrary code execution.

a1c2cb071f3a37f0e186c66af8e3e326bb4546f2.title: USN-2986-1: dosfstools vulnerabilities
a1c2cb071f3a37f0e186c66af8e3e326bb4546f2.body: Hanno Böck discovered that dosfstools incorrectly handled certain malformedfilesystems. A local attacker could use this issue to cause dosfstools tocrash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrarycode.

8559bce1e7959e1e1b13f3d648ba56341f8a4648.body: Baozeng Ding discovered a use-after-free issue in the generic PPP layer inthe Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial ofservice (system crash). (CVE-2016-4805)

d60ca9ab23afe77fa8e6c23d1fe93b1f18880e52.title: USN-3047-1: QEMU vulnerabilities
d60ca9ab23afe77fa8e6c23d1fe93b1f18880e52.body: Li Qiang discovered that QEMU incorrectly handled VMWARE PVSCSI paravirtual SCSI bus emulation support. A privileged attacker inside the guest could use this issue to cause QEMU to crash, resulting in a denial of service. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu 16.04 LTS. (CVE-2016-4952)

c953551b073a3760b9735aeebacd0ce6a902beb2.title: USN-3047-2: QEMU regression

(CVE-2016-4952)

05ed4888fc831fce53ea9ddac39cdb6ea709f003.title: USN-3017-2: Linux kernel (Raspberry Pi 2) vulnerabilities
05ed4888fc831fce53ea9ddac39cdb6ea709f003.body: Jesse Hertz and Tim Newsham discovered that the Linux netfilter implementation did not correctly perform validation when handling 32 bit compatibility IPT_SO_SET_REPLACE events on 64 bit platforms. A local unprivileged attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or execute arbitrary code with administrative privileges. (CVE-2016-4997)

73177aaf611fbae287d92ac203f98acc86ed394e.body: Li Qiang discovered that QEMU incorrectly handled MegaRAID SAS 8708EM2 Host Bus Adapter emulation support. A privileged attacker inside the guest could use this issue to cause QEMU to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly to obtain sensitive host memory. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu 16.04 LTS. (CVE-2016-5105, CVE-2016-5106, CVE-2016-5107, CVE-2016-5337)

e881bac068e3dfbbf9d720fa8bd9a133140108dd.title: USN-3047-2: QEMU regression
e881bac068e3dfbbf9d720fa8bd9a133140108dd.body: Li Qiang discovered that QEMU incorrectly handled MegaRAID SAS 8708EM2 Host Bus Adapter emulation support. A privileged attacker inside the guest could use this issue to cause QEMU to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly to obtain sensitive host memory. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu 16.04 LTS. (CVE-2016-5105, CVE-2016-5106, CVE-2016-5107, CVE-2016-5337)

e7ea844990cbabb9875fa62c1f54d60817d5bbfc.title: USN-3030-1: GD library vulnerabilities
e7ea844990cbabb9875fa62c1f54d60817d5bbfc.body: It was discovered that the GD library incorrectly handled certain malformed XBM images. If a user or automated system were tricked into processing a specially crafted XBM image, an attacker could cause a denial of service. This issue only affected Ubuntu 14.04 LTS, Ubuntu 15.10 and Ubuntu 16.04 LTS. (CVE-2016-5116)

a09e25821a23bab9d1b16ea8cb57c95d75ee1c66.title: USN-3047-1: QEMU vulnerabilities
a09e25821a23bab9d1b16ea8cb57c95d75ee1c66.body: It was discovered that QEMU incorrectly handled certain iSCSI asynchronous I/O ioctl calls. An attacker inside the guest could use this issue to cause QEMU to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code on the host. In the default installation, when QEMU is used with libvirt, attackers would be isolated by the libvirt AppArmor profile. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu 16.04 LTS. (CVE-2016-5126)

46470495ed18edcff18ceb9e9b7cea0b7c13b9d0.title: USN-3047-2: QEMU regression
46470495ed18edcff18ceb9e9b7cea0b7c13b9d0.body: It was discovered that QEMU incorrectly handled certain iSCSI asynchronous I/O ioctl calls. An attacker inside the guest could use this issue to cause QEMU to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code on the host. In the default installation, when QEMU is used with libvirt, attackers would be isolated by the libvirt AppArmor profile. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu 16.04 LTS. (CVE-2016-5126)

da72d49e2f0dfb74050787a258522e8d64c5f9b4.title: USN-3041-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
da72d49e2f0dfb74050787a258522e8d64c5f9b4.body: A use-after-free was discovered in Blink. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit this to cause a denial of service via renderer process crash, or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2016-5127)

3777933f7bb4ffec66b8be2d33f704e9cd0f1a7c.title: USN-3041-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
3777933f7bb4ffec66b8be2d33f704e9cd0f1a7c.body: A memory corruption was discovered in V8. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit this to cause a denial of service via renderer process crash, or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2016-5129)

15eaaa8359e4aeba2b087b5814b4fdf63cfe6da7.title: USN-3041-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
15eaaa8359e4aeba2b087b5814b4fdf63cfe6da7.body: A use-after-free was discovered in libxml. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit this to cause a denial of service via renderer process crash, or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2016-5131)

ea58f6924539f0fa4163143eb71e4a938da9af69.title: USN-3041-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
ea58f6924539f0fa4163143eb71e4a938da9af69.body: It was discovered that Chromium mishandles origin information during proxy authentication. A man-in-the-middle attacker could potentially exploit this to spoof a proxy authentication login prompt. (CVE-2016-5133)

b27140e254acc7cf75acbef3ff62d7826f4decb2.title: USN-3041-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
b27140e254acc7cf75acbef3ff62d7826f4decb2.body: It was discovered that the Proxy Auto-Config (PAC) feature in Chromium does not ensure that URL information is restricted to a scheme, host and port. A remote attacker could potentially exploit this to obtain sensitive information. (CVE-2016-5134)

ce463b157aa65fab6d385ee3fa414170ba714cd9.title: USN-3041-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
ce463b157aa65fab6d385ee3fa414170ba714cd9.body: It was discovered that Blink does not consider referrer-policy information inside an HTML document during a preload request. A remote attacker could potentially exploit this to bypass Content Security Policy (CSP) protections. (CVE-2016-5135)

5775f45255098165c3d0980b1ed53d6f62d0b446.title: USN-3041-1: Oxide vulnerabilities
5775f45255098165c3d0980b1ed53d6f62d0b446.body: It was discovered that the Content Security Policy (CSP) implementation in Blink does not apply http :80 policies to https :443 URLs. A remote attacker could potentially exploit this to determine whether a specific HSTS web site has been visited by reading a CSP report. (CVE-2016-5137)

878a881dcb57dab176cc6f4777d0bdfbc471ae6d.title: USN-3143-1: c-ares vulnerability
878a881dcb57dab176cc6f4777d0bdfbc471ae6d.body: Gzob Qq discovered that c-ares incorrectly handled certain hostnames. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause applications using c-ares to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.

5129836e68ed97604eb3eaf3c2f7ce87e05be874.title: USN-3047-1: QEMU vulnerabilities
5129836e68ed97604eb3eaf3c2f7ce87e05be874.body: Li Qiang discovered that QEMU incorrectly handled 53C9X Fast SCSI controller emulation. A privileged attacker inside the guest could use this issue to cause QEMU to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code on the host. In the default installation, when QEMU is used with libvirt, attackers would be isolated by the libvirt AppArmor profile. This issue only applied to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS and Ubuntu 16.04 LTS. (CVE-2016-4439, CVE-2016-4441, CVE-2016-5238, CVE-2016-5338, CVE-2016-6351)

2230bfafb3b008f3da2e6b7e504fc2808862b15e.title: USN-3052-1: Linux kernel vulnerabilities
2230bfafb3b008f3da2e6b7e504fc2808862b15e.body: Kangjie Lu discovered an information leak in the netlink implementation of the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this to obtain sensitive information from kernel memory. (CVE-2016-5243)

bee905c95d5c10865351813a5fb62def91457223.body: Kangjie Lu discovered an information leak in the netlink implementation of the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this to obtain sensitive information from kernel memory. (CVE-2016-5243)

61c88474619e99f7a96b8eb99b9d363548caafbd.title: USN-3072-2: Linux kernel (OMAP4) vulnerabilities
61c88474619e99f7a96b8eb99b9d363548caafbd.body: Kangjie Lu discovered an information leak in the Reliable Datagram Sockets (RDS) implementation in the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this to obtain potentially sensitive information from kernel memory. (CVE-2016-5244)

9203e27410b38401b04424aed8e82f3c0e81a965.title: USN-3071-1: Linux kernel vulnerabilities
9203e27410b38401b04424aed8e82f3c0e81a965.body: Kangjie Lu discovered an information leak in the Reliable Datagram Sockets (RDS) implementation in the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this to obtain potentially sensitive information from kernel memory. (CVE-2016-5244)

6f8d78307aead68dd4bfd5b1ef9a91630c19a74b.title: USN-3070-2: Linux kernel (Raspberry Pi 2) vulnerabilities
